data.name: Rugby League Live 4 Demo
data.detailed_description:
RUGBY LEAGUE LIVE 4 - FanHub

In the anticipation of the release of Rugby League Live 4, the FanHub puts you at the helm of creativity with the ultimate tools at your fingertips. As in the past you can create and share players, clubs, referee and most importantly yourself.

Featuring now the all New!

Logo Creator - Create any logo you wish and apply to player's, jersey and stadium.

Stadium Creator - Create your own colosseum, boutique stadium or your very own local ground.

Database already includes!

Over 300 NRL Players’ Photorealistic Likenesses with up-to-date 2017 rosters and team jerseys.
data.about_the_game:
RUGBY LEAGUE LIVE 4 - FanHub

In the anticipation of the release of Rugby League Live 4, the FanHub puts you at the helm of creativity with the ultimate tools at your fingertips. As in the past you can create and share players, clubs, referee and most importantly yourself.

Featuring now the all New!

Stadium Creator - Create your own colosseum, boutique stadium or your very own local ground.

Database already includes!

data.short_description: Rugby League Live 4 FanHub is a player and club creator for the full version of the title to be released in 2017. Now featuring a Logo and Stadium creator.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (x64) or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210 / AMD Athlon II X4 555
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6670 or NVIDIA Geforce GT710 with Min 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (x64) or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4200 / AMD Phenom II X4 970
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 390X or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 with minimum 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller Required
